p: The efficiency of PEX was evaluated following the criteria indicated by Schukken et al. [ 13], Ceballosâ€“Marquez et al. [ 5], and the National Mastitis Council [ 23]. A new IMI in a quarter was diagnosed when the same bacterial species is isolated from two out of three consecutive samples during the trial. An individual quarter is eligible for only one new IMI per bacterial species during the trial. In case of the occurrence of CM, the animal was excluded from the study [ 5, 24]. A complete cure was determined when the samples presented without pathogens in three consecutive samplings [ 16].
